alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton County through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Halifax, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Conway around 625 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mud Castle, Milwaukee, Boones Crossroads, Pendleton, Pleasant Grove, Potecasi, Creeksville, Lasker, Jackson and Galatia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
